message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I'm offering it to you at a special price. Considering the product's intrinsic worth and your anticipated use, I propose a transaction at $12,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also allows for a fair negotiation that could benefit both parties. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this deal happen. Kind regards, Alice
